sections.heading: Repealed.Section 64-3-2 - Repealed.
sections.text: Repeals.— Laws 1987, ch. 318, § 98B repealed 64-3-1 NMSA 1978, as enacted by Laws 1949, ch. 147, § 1, relating to creation of civil air patrol division, effective April 10, 1987.

sections.heading: Repealed.
sections.text: Repeals.— Laws 1987, ch. 318, § 98B repealed 64-3-2 NMSA 1978, as enacted by Laws 1955, ch. 84, § 1, relating to cooperation with other agencies authorized, effective April 10, 1987.
